Shirts.description: A list of classnames of shirts, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

Pants.description: A list of classnames of Pants, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

Shoes.description: A list of classnames of Shoes, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

BackPacks.description: A list of classnames of BackPacks, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

Vests.description: A list of classnames of Vests, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

Headgear.description: A list of classnames of Headgear, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

Gloves.description: A list of classnames of Gloves, whichthe AI will be given one of at random.

ClothesHealth.description: The clothes on the AI are randomly assigned a health, between the first and second number.

WeaponRifle.description: The primary weapon which the AI spawn with, chosen at random from the list. Make sure it is a magazine fed weapon.

WeaponRifleMagCount.description: The amount of magazines randomly given to the AI, between the first number and second number. All magazines are filled.

WeaponHealth.description: The Weapon on the AI are randomly assigned a health, between the first and second number.

Loot.description: For now, the AI is given 2 items from your loot table at random when it spawns. A more sophisticated loot system will be implemented in the future.

LootHealth.description: The Loot on the AI are randomly assigned a health, between the first and second number.
